start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for User Insights, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The value of the access token generated. See the docs for more information

ig_user_ids.title: Instagram Business Account ID(s)
ig_user_ids.description: Comma separated list of Instagram Business Account IDs. Each account ID must be specified as a 17-digit number without dashes. See the instagram documentation for more information
